subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The Philadelphia Flyers have won only one of their first eight games — their worst start in 17 years — leading to the dismissal of head coach Ken Hitchcock and the resignation of general manager Bob Clarke.
snippet: The Philadelphia Flyers have won only one of their first eight games — their worst start in 17 years — leading to the dismissal of head coach Ken Hitchcock and the resignation of general manager Bob Clarke.
